name: T-Shirt
description: A casual, short-sleeved top made from lightweight fabric like cotton or a cotton blend. It usually has a round neckline (crew neck) or a V-neck, and comes in endless colors, patterns, and designs, making it a wardrobe essential.

name: Jeans
description: Sturdy, versatile pants made from denim fabric. They typically feature a button or zipper fly, pockets, and a straight or tapered leg. Jeans come in various styles like skinny, bootcut, or relaxed fit, and can be light, dark, or distressed for different looks.

name: Blazer
description: A tailored jacket that’s more casual than a suit jacket but more polished than a regular coat. It often features structured shoulders, lapels, and buttons. Blazers can be paired with dress pants, chinos, or even jeans for a smart, versatile look.

name: Tie
description: A long, narrow piece of fabric worn around the neck, typically tied in a knot at the front. Ties are usually made from silk, polyester, or cotton and are commonly worn with dress shirts for a polished, formal appearance.

name: Belt
description: A long, flexible strap made from materials like leather, fabric, or synthetic blends, designed to hold pants securely around the waist. It often features a buckle for adjusting the fit, and can serve as both a functional and stylish accessory.

name: Sunglasses
description: Eyewear designed to protect the eyes from sunlight and harmful UV rays. They typically consist of tinted or polarized lenses set within a frame, available in a variety of shapes — from classic aviators and wayfarers to modern oversized designs.
